productSpecification:
The following features are delivered through the hardware.

     

  • WAN:

    • Embedded 150M Category 4, LTE modem with DC-HSPA Failover

  • LAN:

    • One LAN 10/100 Ethernet port

  • TEMPERATURE:

    • 0 °C to 50 °C (32 °F to 122 °F) operating
    • -20 °C to 70 °C (-4 °F to 158 °F) storage

  • HUMIDITY (non-condensing):

    • 10% to 85% operating
    • 5% to 90% storage

  • POWER:

    • 802.3af (15 W) or 802.3at (30 W) PoE capable

  • POWER CONSUMPTION (Typical):

    • Idle: 1.5W
    • Heavy Usage (max power): 5.1W

  • SIZE:

    • 4.8 × 4.8 × 1.7 in (122 × 122 × 42 mm)

  • HOUSING:

    • White plastic, locking compatible
    • Wall, desk, or DIN Rail mounting

  • CERTIFICATIONS:

    • FCC, CE, IC, GCF-CC, RCM (Australia & New Zealand), IDA (Singapore), SIRIM (Malayisa)
    • Safety: UL/CUL/CB Scheme
    • Materials: WEEE, RoHS, RoHS-2, California Prop 65

packagecontents.text: (1) CBA550 Adapter with embedded 150M LTE modem

insertSim:
Insert an Activated SIM

  1. Slide the SIM door cover to the left to reveal the SIM slots.
  1. Insert 1 or 2 active 2FF-sized SIM cards into the slot(s). Contacts up. Notch in. It will click into place. Depress the SIM card to remove it.
  1. Slide the SIM door cover to the right to cover the SIM slots.
  1. Secure the SIM door with the SIM door screw.
attachCellularAntenna:
Attach the 4G LTE antennas

  1. Attach the included cellular modem antennas to the connectors.
  1. Hold the antenna straight and twist the base to thread onto the device. Tighten with fingers only (maximum torque not to exceed 4 in-lbs). Do not over-tighten.
  1. Angle the antennas based on the diagram below.

Connect the Power Source

  1. The CBA550 is powered a PoE-enabled RJ45 cable.
  2. Connect LAN port to PoE enabled networking equipment to Passthrough 3G/4G Internet to Ethernet and receive power.
    • NOTE: If the router does not support PoE or does not have a PoE capable port, use a PoE injector optional accessory between the CBA550 and the router for power.
